notes.text:
This update for wavpack fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-19840: Fixed a denial-of-service in the WavpackPackInit function from pack_utils.c (bsc#1120930)
- CVE-2018-19841: Fixed a denial-of-service in the WavpackVerifySingleBlock function from open_utils.c (bsc#1120929)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The function WavpackPackInit in pack_utils.c in libwavpack.a in WavPack through 5.1.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (resource exhaustion caused by an infinite loop) via a crafted wav audio file because WavpackSetConfiguration64 mishandles a sample rate of zero.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: The function WavpackVerifySingleBlock in open_utils.c in libwavpack.a in WavPack through 5.1.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted WavPack Lossless Audio file, as demonstrated by wvunpack.
notes.title: CVE description
